thread.title: Egypt to face Chad in 2018 World Cup qualifiers - National Teams - Sports

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Egypt to face Chad in 2018 World Cup qualifiers - National Teams - Sports
text:
Related African World Cup qualifications fixtures & results (preliminary round) Cuper happy to ease tensions between Egypt players Koka inspires Egypt to 3-0 friendly win over Zambia Egypt will open their 2018 World Cup qualifying campaign against Chad after the latter scraped into the second round of the qualifiers on the away goal rule following a 2-2 aggregate draw with Sierra Leone on Tuesday.
Despite their 2-1 loss in the second leg of the first round on Tuesday, Chad advanced after winning the first leg 1-0 at home last Saturday.
Based on their FIFA ranking, Egypt were given a bye into the second round, which will be played next month.
The winners of the second-round games will be drawn into five four-team groups, with the leaders directly reaching the 2018 World Cup finals in Russia.
